title: Episode 338: The Perfect Wedding (Feat. Ari Fletcher)
itunes:title: Episode 338: The Perfect Wedding (Feat. Ari Fletcher)
description:
Entrepreneur/influencer, Ari Fletcher joins the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote her cooking show with YouTube and her non-profit organizations. She tells us all about her relationship with Moneybagg Yo, including what she wants her proposal and wedding to look like, how they pick out threesomes, their relationships with each others family members, and much more. Ari also breaks down why she feels misunderstood, as well as the pressures of being a role model. Enjoy!
